amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds in the bill for road construction where such construction is prohibited by any Federal environmental law or the applicable land management plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that forest road construction authorized under the provisions of the bill would not take place where the construction would be prohibited by and Federal environmental law or the applicable land management plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (OR) amendment (A003) as amended Failed by voice vote.
